poem:
"Yearning For Numbers"

In the grey clementine dawn of 2024,
Numbers dance, twirling on a cryptic floor.
Digits from one to nine take the floor,
Making twenty-four with additive encore.

123456 multiplies by seven, hand-in-hand,
Then eight and nine do a little stand,
Waltzing in the hands of a sanguine band,
A cryptic reel, through time's shifting sand.
